turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter. It's for my annual check-up.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Do you have any preferred dates or times in mind?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, I'm pretty flexible. Maybe sometime next week? Preferably in the afternoon.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. How about Tuesday at 2 PM or Thursday at 3:30 PM?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, those don't really work. Is there anything earlier on Thursday? I have something later that day.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... on Thursday, the earliest available slot is 11:00 AM. Would that work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Perfect, 11 AM on Thursday works. One quick question, does Dr. Carter's office still offer the early morning blood draw before the check-up? Last year, it saved me a trip.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, the early morning blood draw is still available. I can add that to your appointment for Thursday at 10:30 AM. Please arrive 30 minutes prior to your check-up. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Great, that's all. Thanks for your help!
